keyPolicies.policyDescription: Work with authorities and local residents to reduce crime and anti-social behavior. Support residents' calls for more CCTV. Ensure extra police officers on the beat in the area.
Supporting local businesses and traders by cutting business rates. Lobby government for funds to invest in markets. Ensure small and medium sized businesses continue to thrive.
Drive forward a positive environmental agenda. Address air pollution across the borough, introduce more electric charging points for cars, and plant more trees in open spaces.

issues.environment: Drive forward a positive environmental agenda to address air pollution across the borough, including more electric charging points for cars and planting more trees in open spaces.

images.caption: Nicholas greetings at Roman Road Market.
